issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
An error occurs when running an instance in a subnet when a private IP address is specified:

{code}
# euca-run-instances -s subnet-588d023f --private-ip-address 172.26.64.15 -k root emi-7496f5c1 --debug
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 DEBUG   RunInstances parsed arguments: {'user_data': None, 'iam_profile': None, 'Placement.GroupName': None, 'EbsOptimized': None, 'RamdiskId': None, 'subnet': 'subnet-588d023f', 'group': [], 'key_id': None, 'Monitoring.Enabled': None, 'ImageId': 'emi-7496f5c1', 'KeyName': 'root', 'ClientToken': None, 'user_data_file': None, 'InstanceType': None, 'AddressingType': None, 'BlockDeviceMapping': [], 'user_data_force': None, 'InstanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior': None, 'NetworkInterface': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'secondary_private_ip_address': None, 'KernelId': None, 'count': '1', 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'Placement.Tenancy': None, 'Placement.AvailabilityZone': None, 'private_ip_address': '172.26.64.15', 'secondary_private_ip_address_count': None, 'secret_key': None, 'DisableApiTermination': None, 'region': None}
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 INFO    Config finding global option default-region
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 INFO    Config   novalue for default-region
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 INFO    Config finding global option max-retries
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 INFO    Config   novalue for max-retries
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 INFO    Config finding global option timeout
2014-07-08 17:31:16,566 INFO    Config   novalue for timeout
euca-run-instances: error: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'append'
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/bin/euca-run-instances", line 6, in <module>
    euca2ools.commands.ec2.runinstances.RunInstances.run()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run
    cmd.handle_cli_exception(err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 237, in handle_cli_exception
    BaseCommand.handle_cli_exception(self, err)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run
    result = cmd.main()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 217, in main
    self.preprocess()
  File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/runinstances.py", line 237, in preprocess
    self.params['NetworkInterface'].append(cli_iface)
AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'append'
#
# euca-run-instances --version
euca2ools 3.1.0-2-g825506e (Omega
{code}
fields.summary: Error running instance in subnet with specified private address

comments.body: FIx Verified Installed Packages Name : euca2ools Arch : noarch Version : 3.1.0 Release : 0.0.1558.13.20140925git40c0e90.el6 Although I do not have a VPC cloud setup, I can verify euca2ools is correctly crafting the request with the given parameters. The returned error seen is valid and correct given the test cloud configuration. {code} [root@d-31 ~]# euca-run-instances -s subnet-ca66e524 --private-ip-address 172.31.0.5 -k root emi-f77986ef --debug 2014-10-10 13:02:46,498 DEBUG RunInstances parsed arguments: {'user_data': None, 'iam_profile': None, 'Placement.GroupName': None, 'EbsOptimized': None, 'RamdiskId': None, 'subnet': 'subnet-ca66e524', 'group': [], 'key_id': None, 'Monitoring.Enabled': None, 'ImageId': 'emi-f77986ef', 'KeyName': 'root', 'ClientToken': None, 'user_data_file': None, 'InstanceType': None, 'AddressingType': None, 'BlockDeviceMapping': [], 'user_data_force': None, 'InstanceInitiatedShutdownBehavior': None, 'NetworkInterface': None, 'show_empty_fields': False, 'secondary_private_ip_address': None, 'KernelId': None, 'count': '1', 'security_token': None, 'url': None, 'Placement.Tenancy': None, 'Placement.AvailabilityZone': None, 'private_ip_address': '172.31.0.5', 'secondary_private_ip_address_count': None, 'secret_key': None, 'DisableApiTermination': None, 'region': None} 2014-10-10 13:02:46,498 INFO Config finding global option default-region 2014-10-10 13:02:46,499 INFO Config novalue for default-region 2014-10-10 13:02:46,499 INFO Config finding global option max-retries 2014-10-10 13:02:46,499 INFO Config novalue for max-retries 2014-10-10 13:02:46,499 INFO Config finding global option timeout 2014-10-10 13:02:46,499 INFO Config novalue for timeout 2014-10-10 13:02:46,502 INFO RunInstances parameters: {'NetworkInterface.1.PrivateIpAddresses.1.PrivateIpAddress': '172.31.0.5', 'NetworkInterface.1.PrivateIpAddresses.1.Primary': 'true', 'NetworkInterface.1.SubnetId': 'subnet-ca66e524', 'ImageId': 'emi-f77986ef', 'KeyName': 'root', 'Version': '2013-02-01', 'MaxCount': '1', 'Action': 'RunInstances', 'MinCount': '1', 'NetworkInterface.1.DeviceIndex': '0'} 2014-10-10 13:02:46,503 INFO EC2 sending request (attempt 1 of 3) 2014-10-10 13:02:46,504 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth string to sign: 'POST\n10.111.1.101:8773\n/services/compute\nAWSAccessKeyId=AKIVBFL8QEIJFKMRSEQW&Action=RunInstances&ImageId=emi-f77986ef&KeyName=root&MaxCount=1&MinCount=1&NetworkInterface.1.DeviceIndex=0&NetworkInterface.1.PrivateIpAddresses.1.Primary=true&NetworkInterface.1.PrivateIpAddresses.1.PrivateIpAddress=172.31.0.5&NetworkInterface.1.SubnetId=subnet-ca66e524&SignatureMethod=HmacSHA256&SignatureVersion=2&Timestamp=2014-10-10T20%3A02%3A46Z&Version=2013-02-01' 2014-10-10 13:02:46,504 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth b64-encoded signature: 1o0eGH9A/y7RuWugMiBWldWzbTJt6LUnFS61tmN6jTI= 2014-10-10 13:02:46,504 DEBUG QuerySigV2Auth converting params to POST data 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request method: POST 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request url: http://10.111.1.101:8773/services/compute 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request header: Content-Length: 468 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request header: Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request header: Host: 10.111.1.101:8773 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request header: User-Agent: euca2ools/3.1.0-39-g40c0e90 (CPython 2.6.6; Linux 2.6.32-431.29.2.el6.x86_64; x86_64) requestbuilder/0.2.1 requests/1.1.0 2014-10-10 13:02:46,512 DEBUG EC2 request data: AWSAccessKeyId: AKIVBFL8QEIJFKMRSEQW 2014-10-10 13:02:46,513 DEBUG EC2 request data: Action: RunInstances 2014-10-10 13:02:46,513 DEBUG EC2 request data: ImageId: emi-f77986ef 2014-10-10 SignatureVersion: 2 2014-10-10 13:02:46,514 DEBUG EC2 request data: Timestamp: 2014-10-10T20:02:46Z 2014-10-10 13:02:46,514 DEBUG EC2 request data: Version: 2013-02-01 2014-10-10 13:02:46,725 DEBUG EC2 response time: 0.210 seconds 2014-10-10 13:02:46,725 ERROR EC2 response status: 400 2014-10-10 13:02:46,725 DEBUG EC2 response header: content-length: 255 2014-10-10 13:02:46,725 DEBUG EC2 response header: content-type: application/xml; charset=UTF-8 2014-10-10 13:02:46,726 DEBUG RunInstances -- response content -- InvalidParameterValueEC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface0571249a-d95b-4ed3-a75d-0167717852e3 2014-10-10 13:02:46,726 DEBUG RunInstances -- end of response content -- 2014-10-10 13:02:46,726 INFO RunInstances result: failure euca-run-instances: error (InvalidParameterValue): EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface Traceback (most recent call last): File "/usr/bin/euca-run-instances", line 6, in euca2ools.commands.ec2.runinstances.RunInstances.run() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 298, in run cmd.handle_cli_exception(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/command.py", line 295, in run result = cmd.main() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 218, in main response = self.send() File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 180, in send return self.handle_server_error(err) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/request.py", line 167, in send auth=self.auth) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/requestbuilder/service.py", line 193, in send_request self.handle_http_error(response) File "/usr/lib/python2.6/site-packages/euca2ools/commands/ec2/__init__.py", line 61, in handle_http_error raise AWSError(response) euca2ools.exceptions.AWSError: (400, 'InvalidParameterValue', 'InvalidParameterValue', 'EC2-VPC not supported, for EC2-Classic do not specify subnet or network interface') {code}
